name: Mech Mechanic
description:
You are the Mech Mechanic, quickly repair your mech when it breaks down to survive.

Eldon Thoran is the youngest son of the illustrious commander of the Mech Army, General Cordell Thoran. After Eldon failed out of the Mech Pilot Academy, his father relegated young Eldon to the local trade school to become a Mech Mechanic for the old generation of Battle Mechs. Unfortunately for young Eldon, two days after barely completing trade school…

REBELLION!!!

The NextGen Mechs turned on the people of Earth! Outraged, General Thoran activates the dormant Mech Army and deploys them against the NextGen Mechs. Through the chaos, Elden is assigned to the Mega Mech, an isolated Mech sent to guard the eastern border from rogue battalions of NextGen Mechs.

But unbeknownst to all, the nefarious forces at work are not all that they seem to be…

Take control of young Eldon Thoran and the Mega Mech as you defend the eastern border. Be sure to keep an eye on Mega Mech’s status and help Eldon repair the Mega Mech when damaged using parts scavenged from the ruined NextGen Mechs. 

Hint: Remember to assemble the damaged control cube in the correct order.
